page.title: 12GAMES
page.content: GAMES WE PLAY "TIG".SOMEONE IS"IT" AND HE CHASES THE OTHER PEOPLE.IF HE TIGS<TOUCHES>ONE OF THEM THAT PERSON IS "IT". IN "BULLDOG" SOME BODY IS IN THE MIDDLE OF TWO PARALLEL LINES AND THE CHILDREN TRY TO CROSS THEM. THE ONE IN THE MIDDLE TRIES TO CATCH SOMEONE, THEN THEY BOTH CATCH, AND SO ON UNTIL THERE IS NO ONE LEFT. I LIKE PLAYING "MYSTERY MAZE". YOU HAVE A LITTLE BALL ON A BOARD AND YOU PUT IT IN THE FIRST HOLE WHICH SAYS "WAY-IN".FOLLOW THE COLOURED LINES TO FIND THE WAY OUT. SOMETIMES YOU CAN TAKE SHORT-CUTS. I LIKE PLAYING WITH A HOOP. I CAN ROLL IT AND SOMETIMES RUN THROUGH IT,AND I CAN THROW IT SO THAT IT COMES BACK TO ME.
